channel.title: Starting Items
channel.description: How do I change the items when you start off?

item.title: Starting Items
item.dc:creator: @moparRuler moparRuler
item.description:
@moparRuler wrote:

[code]o sorry i been busy but here u go mate

else if (npcs[i].npcType == id of npc) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("admin")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "name is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "name is OFFLINE"; } }

add it after this

   [code]FollowPlayer(i);
                                            }
				}[/code]

so it look like this

   [code]FollowPlayer(i);
                                            }
				}

else if (npcs[i].npcType == id of npc)
{
if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“admin”))
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “name is ONLINE”;
}
else
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “name is OFFLINE”;
}
}[/code]

hope helps some :D[/code]

Read full topic

YOU'RE TOTALY MAXED OUT!!!."); }

item.dc:creator: @bmnevil bmnevil
item.description:
@bmnevil wrote:

k ill show you what changes i made …

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(0, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);

addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“N33b!.”);
}

if (command.startsWith(“2bill”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(995,2000000000 );

		}

if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
npcId = newNPC;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage(“No such P-NPC.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #”);
}[/code]

one part-----

}
break;

case 5959: // Wildy lever to mage bank

if(!teleblock)
{
teleportToX = 2539;
teleportToY = 4712;
}
else if(teleblock)

}
}

item.title: Starting Items
item.dc:creator: @moparRuler moparRuler
item.description:
@moparRuler wrote:

ok this is on how to make shops

need: client.java and shops.cfg
expirence: copy/paste

first open client.java and search for this } else if (NPCID ==

it would kinda look like this

} else if (NPCID == 3796) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop

this is what you do to add new one go to the last wanneshop = 2 number i mean like the last number if its 40 or 50 i am not sure what source you have but go to the last wanneshop. then add this

else if (NPCID == id of npc) {// name of shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = number; // Name again

ok to explain on the WanneShop = number thing they work together with the shops.cfg so it has to match numbers. so when you get to last wanneshop in ur client if number is 40 make it 41 then in ur shops.cfg this is what you should do.

shop = 2	Aubury__magic_Shope			2	2	554	5000	555	5000	556	5000	557	5000	558	5000

see the 2 matches with the wanneshop = 2. so when u make ur new shop this is what you add

shop = number name 2 2 id amount and so on hope helps works best with trading npcs but also works with talking to my knowledge

Read full topic
